projects.title: dylanfinn.dev
projects.description: My personal website, where you are right now!  Built using Javascript, Docker, Nginx, and lots of coffee

projects.title: CodeSnatch
projects.description: Takes an image of code on a whiteboard or other 'irl' surfaces, converts them to machine readable text, and executes the code.  Build with Node.JS and Tesseract OCR

projects.title: Salvo
projects.description: A very efficient port scanner written in Golang

projects.title: Castway
projects.description: I worked with a team as the backend lead to build an open-source P2P web conferencing platform

projects.title: Custom-Email-Blaster
projects.description: I had to opportunity to help a non-profit organization, Real Options for City Kids (or R.O.C.K.) by building a robust mass emailing system
